languages.text: "Только преподобный Иеронимус в этом безумии расцвел. Он со своими миссионерами день и ночь проповедует до хрипоты, вещает про страдания, которые мы заслужили, разве что сам за огнемет не взялся пока. И пугают меня не столько его пламенные речи, сколько то, что я, кажется, сама начинаю в них верить..."

traits.locale_text: "Преподобный Иеронимус в этом всем безумии себя, кажется, чувствует как рыба в воде. Он со своими друзианцами день и ночь проповедует до хрипоты, вещает про страдания, которых мы все заслуживаем, разве что сам за огнемет не хватается. И пугают меня не столько его пламенные речи, сколько то, что я, кажется, сама начинаю в них верить..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."
languages.original_text: "Только преподобный Иеронимус в этом безумии расцвел. Он со своими миссионерами день и ночь проповедует до хрипоты, вещает про страдания, которые мы заслужили, разве что сам за огнемет не взялся пока. И пугают меня не столько его пламенные речи, сколько то, что я, кажется, сама начинаю в них верить..."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've deserved. It's almost like he'll grab a flamethrower himself any day now. And what scares me is not so much his fiery sermons but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “在这场疯狂之中，只有希罗尼穆斯牧师意气风发。他和他那群传教士没日没夜地布道，直到说得喉咙痛为止。他说这样的苦难是我们应得的下场，说得就好像他自己随时都要抄起火焰喷射器一样。让我感到害怕的并不是他火热的布道，而是连我自己都快相信他说的那堆鬼话了……”
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."

traits.locale_text: “在这场疯狂之中，只有希罗尼穆斯牧师意气风发。他和他那群传教士没日没夜地布道，直到说到喉咙痛为止。他们说这场苦难是我们应得的下场，说得就好像他自己随时都要抄起喷火器一样。让我感到害怕的并不是他火热的布道，而是连我自己都快相信他说的那堆话了……”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「リバーエンド・ヒエロニムスだけが、この狂気状態の中で成功をしています。彼は聖務団と、連日連夜、喉が痛くなるまで説教を続け、苦しみは私たちが受けて当然なのだと、語っている。今にも自らの手で火炎放射器を握りしめそうな、勢いです。でも、私が最も恐れているのは彼らの説教自体ではないんです。私自身がそう、信じてしまいそうなのが怖いんです」
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."

traits.locale_text: 「リバーエンド・ヒエロニムスだけが、この狂気状態の中で成功をしています。彼は聖務団と、連日連夜、喉が痛くなるまで説教を続け、苦しみは私たちが受けて当然なのだと、語っている。今にも自らの手で火炎放射器を握りしめそうな、勢いです。でも、私が最も恐れているのは彼らの説教自体ではないんです。私自身がそう、信じてしまいそうなのが怖いんです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «El reverendo Hieronymus es el único que ha prosperado en medio de esta locura. Él y sus misioneros se pasan día y noche predicando hasta que les duele la garganta, hablando del sufrimiento que nos hemos ganado. Es casi como si él mismo fuera a coger un lanzallamas cualquier día de estos. Y lo que me asusta no son sus sermones, sino que hasta yo estoy a punto de creérmelos...».
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."

traits.locale_text: «El reverendo Hieronymus es el único que ha prosperado en medio de esta locura. Él y sus misioneros se pasan día y noche predicando hasta que les duele la garganta, hablando del sufrimiento que nos hemos merecido. Es casi como si él mismo fuera a coger un lanzallamas cualquier día de estos. Y lo que me asusta no son sus sermones, sino que hasta yo estoy a punto de creérmelos...».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Reverend Hieronymus ist der Einzige, der in diesem ganzen Wahnsinn aufgeblüht ist. Er und seine Missionare predigen Tag und Nacht, bis sie heiser sind, erzählen uns, dass wir das ganze Leid verdient hätten. Man könnte fast denken, dass er sich selber bald einen Flammenwerfer schnappt. Aber seine flammenden Predigten machen wir gar nicht am meisten Angst, sondern eher die Tatsache, dass ich kurz davor stehe, sie selbst zu glauben ..."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus ist der Einzige, der in diesem ganzen Wahnsinn aufgeblüht ist. Er und seine Missionare predigen Tag und Nacht, bis sie heiser sind, erzählen uns, dass wir das ganze Leid verdient hätten. Man könnte fast denken, dass er sich selber bald einen Flammenwerfer schnappt. Aber seine flammenden Predigten machen wir gar nicht am meisten Angst, sondern eher die Tatsache, dass ich kurz davor stehe, sie selbst zu glauben ..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Le révérend Hiéronymus est le seul à avoir le vent en poupe au milieu de tout ce micmac. Ses missionnaires et lui prêchent à longueur de journée jusqu'à en perdre la voix ; il raconte qu'on mérite ce qui nous arrive, avec une telle ferveur qu'on dirait qu'il va finir par prendre lui-même un lance-flammes. Et ce qui me fait peur, ce n'est pas tant ses sermons passionnés, mais le fait que je commencerais presque à y croire... »
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."

traits.locale_text: « Le révérend Hiéronymus est le seul à avoir le vent en poupe au milieu de tout ce micmac. Ses missionnaires et lui prêchent à longueur de journée jusqu'à en perdre la voix ; il raconte qu'on mérite ce qui nous arrive, avec une telle ferveur qu'on dirait qu'il va finir par prendre lui-même un lance-flamme. Et ce qui me fait peur, ce n'est pas tant ses sermons passionnés, mais le fait que je commencerais presque à y croire moi-même... »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Muhterem Hieronymus, bu rezaletin ortasında kâr eden tek kişi oldu. Misyonerleriyle beraber gece gündüz vaaz veriyor, sesleri kısılana dek durmuyorlar. Başımıza gelenlerin müsebbibi kendimizmişiz, öyle diyorlar. Görseniz sanırsınız ki bugün yarın eline alevsaçanı alacak. Hararetli vaazlarındansa bunlara inanmanın eşiğine gelmiş olmak daha çok korkutuyor beni..."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus is the only one who's flourished amid this madness. He and his missionaries spend days and nights preaching till their throats are sore, talking about the suffering we've brought down upon ourselves. It's almost like he'll grab a flamer himself any day now. And what scares me isn't so much his fiery sermons, but me being on the verge of believing them myself..."
